Description: Hollow-cast copper alloy of Bastet striding and holding an aegis; right ear pierced; eyes gilded; the feet are lost.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2006/8 Sept-Sept, Wallsend, Segedunum Roman Fort & Baths Museum, Egypt Revealed
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Louis, Duc de Blacas d'Aulps
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: Louis, Duc de Blacas d'Aulps
